about.name: Emmanuel Karibiye
about.aboutme: Hi! I'm Emmanuel Karibiye, a passionate developer and tech enthusiast. I enjoy building clean, user-friendly web applications and continuously learning new technologies. When I'm not coding, I love music, gaming, exploring new ideas, and collaborating with like-minded creatives.

details: Developed a back-end application using Java Spring Boot, Terraform, Docker, and AWS to perform data validation and quality checks.
Created a RESTful API with MySQL to store and manage data.
Resolved critical data-quality bugs, helping protect the security of over 80 million clients globally.
Performed analytics and visualisations on large datasets.
Automated dashboard generation using R, Python, SQL, and Tableau, improving team efficiency.
Resolved key Microsoft SQL issues involving over 50 000 rows of data.
Carried out pressure/leak analysis on the doors and came up with a design solution, boosting efficiency.
Designed plans and specified dimensions to be followed in building HVAC systems for data centres.
Observed and documented SOPs for building hyperscale ventilation systems.
